title: So why is Yasuo even in blood moon?
body: This champ offers nothing compared to the assassins. Maybe Herald soloing, but you can already do that with Shaco. You get deleted and you can barely even use your full kit. No minions to dash around and you can't stack your Qs fast enough to ult.

replies.body: I am not sure why Yasuo is in the game to begin with
"CertainlyT"

if yasuo is counted as an assassin then you might as well add every single ADC to blood moon as yasuo only turns into an ''assassin'' when he has infinite edge + crit chance item just like every other ADC

I get that this is mostly for comedy, but to be fair, Yasuo has a lot of mobility that adcs don't have.
To be fair, most if it cannot be utilized in Blood Moon, but he still is much more mobile than any ADC could hope to be, one of the key parts that distinguish assassin from any other class.

> [{quoted}](name=Hello I am Bird,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XcAUjEKE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-09-04T14:02:20.085+0000)
>
> I get that this is mostly for comedy, but to be fair, Yasuo has a lot of mobility that adcs don't have.
> To be fair, most if it cannot be utilized in Blood Moon, but he still is much more mobile than any ADC could hope to be, one of the key parts that distinguish assassin from any other class.

he actually isn't all that mobile in blood moon though since if it's 1 vs 1 he can only dash 1 every what 8 seconds or something? in that regard vayne is more mobile than yasuo, as is lucian for example

i think we need a blood moon
{{champion:18}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:67}}
We just got an Omega Squad skin for both Tristana and Twitch. Vayne already got Soulstealer quite a while ago and Teemo just feels iffy.
but teemo is a devil so kinda suits him :)
TEEMO IS THE SPAWN OF SATAN, NOT THE DEVIL. THE SPAWN.
even if he's the spawn of satan just makes a bloodmoon skin suit him more
I just hate the champion is all, LOL.
Blood Moon {{champion:117}} , m8. That's what we need.
Blood Moon is for "assassins and aggressive divers". Assassins aren't the only champs allowed in.
He's secondary assassin and he has a bloodmoon skin
Why is Twisted Fate not in there then? He even got his bloodmoon skin when the gamemode first debued
Because he has no assassin/aggressive diver like qualities. He's a mage.
He can burst you down with a lich bane and a ludens easily. Kennen is included, and he has way less burst than TF.
'Assassin' is not the same thing as 'burst'.
Kennen has mobility, TF doesn't unless he ults which, if he WAS in the game mode, the second he ulted onto someone the assassin he's ulting to would turn around and murder him.
{{item:3146}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3285}} {{champion:4}}  says hi

Twisted Fate's ult would prove incredibly problematic to the mode, I think. Revealing all enemies and being able to teleport at will would allow him to pick off people with the blood moon buff. Not only that, but the ult cools down faster.
cause he is an assassin, he is an ionian so he has a blood moon skin
If Yasuo is an assassin then Tryndamere is.

> [{quoted}](name=TotalJerk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XcAUjEKE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-04T06:27:30.481+0000)
>
> If Yasuo is an assassin then Tryndamere is.

I'm fairly certain that Tryndamere is classed as fighter/assassin just like Yasuo is.
They aren't actually assassins, though. Syndra's secondary is support.
You can solo herald with literally any champion (even soraka with support items) at level 9. Not sure where that becomes a benchmark skill :P
Rift Herald in Blood Moon is the same one we had in the past. The one with the much faster turning after every attack so only few champs can actually hit the eye without help.

Because 200% crit is a good decision on a champion to keep them balanced.

Riot, you gave everyone cancer with that.  Combine it with "lol@your-armor-ult" and you've created such a well balanced nightmare.  Everyone should take turns slapping each other until they actually get around to fixing this stupid garbage.

[EDIT]
I apologize for my blind rage.
Blind rage is fine {{champion:64}}

I understand you completely.
I'm so sick of seeing yasuo. 
Especially as a melee bruiser with long ass cooldowns fighting him top i just get aids from playing against him. He has better sustain, no mana, he can harass you with no way for you to answer it and once he has PD you are not going to ever fight him again. 
Tabis and PD cost the same for him as one titanic hydra for a bruiser....

> I'm so sick of seeing yasuo. Especially as a melee bruiser with long ass cooldowns fighting him top i just get aids from playing against him.

Just ban him.

> He has better sustain

Not always. There are quite a few match ups that can encourage you to build double doran's on him so that you can have a much better laning phase.

> he can harass you with no way for you to answer it

Incorrect. Hard CC.

> once he has PD you are not going to ever fight him again.

That's why you camp a Yasuo during laning phase, to keep him behind from getting PD and whatever early on in the game. Not even that, when he does have PD, if you're having a difficult time dealing with him, just have your team rotate to your lane and just push. If a teamfight breaks out, hard CC the Yasuo and just delete him. I've said this time and time again. Yasuo is all about high damage output along with high mobility. If he lacks mobility, he lacks damage.
Why is Nidalee not in there, she's listed as an assassin.

Nidalee's burst relies too heavily on her Hunt passive.
If you can't get people to step on your traps or land a spear she does no damage.
So land your spears.

Yes, land your spears in a game mode where everyone has increased movement speed, all champions are mobile, and if you jump onto them in Cougar they will delete you. 

Sounds like a solid plan.

Yeah, they will. Nid players know how to aim.

In any case, your entire argument is irrelevant. A champion being "too hard" is not a valid reason to take them out of this game mode.
Agreed.
But she's an assassin. That means she should be in the assassin's only game mode. Are you telling me she isn't an assassin?
Literally because he's got the skin for it.
His only purpose is to ruin Talon's day.
Because he has a Blood Moon skin...?

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XcAUjEKE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-09-04T14:43:12.118+0000)
>
> Because he has a Blood Moon skin...?

Might as well put {{champion:412}} and {{champion:26}} in there then.

To be honest, I forgot that they had those skins.

I suppose it's because nobody wants to play a late-game champion or a tank support, and because the items that support them just don't exist in the mode. A tank would be useless in a general bloodbath mode like this one, especially one with so many assassins running around. He just wouldn't have time to scale. And Zilean would either be garbage or cancerous, depending on how strong his ult ended up being in it.

And Yasuo can work relatively well in Blood Moon, I've proved that myself. Especially if you have a Lee on your team.

Bloodmoon is not related only to assassins. It was first an Ionian festival, and thus only champions from Ionia got bloodmoon skins. But people wanted more and Riot said "fuck it, who cares about lore lol" (What is lore, baby don't hurt me) and gave skins to most popular champs: Thresh, Yasuo, Kalista etc.
Isn't Yasuo Ionian? And hasn't he had that skin for ages?
To go along with this, why is Kennen in it?
Idk it feels like he oneshots me faster than a {{champion:107}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:91}} etc with an Auto+Q+Auto after he completes 2 items

That's if a Yasuo can do that fast enough. There aren't any creeps in this game-mode. And even if he does dash on you, it's one dash. Whatever champion you're playing, there's a chance you'll have some good mobility other than flash.
Camille doesn't really belong either. I think Yasuo gets to be in just because he's a popular champ and there would be diehard Yasuo mains saying "why ISN'T Yasuo allowed in" if he wasn't already.

Both Yasuo and Shaco need replaced.
Shaco's playstyle is too cowardly for an assassin game mode. 
If he knows someone is nearby he just sets his virginity box and stands on it. 
If you try to jump him the box fears you and you're unable to kill him because during that fear he just stealth blinks away like a coward. 

He's not fun to play against ever because of this.
